Text.Page:
Two questions for you, . And they're related.

Ever heard the phrase "madder than an mugato nest?"

You notice the mugato nest just south of here?

We can't have a nest that close. Can you drive away the {@LinkCreature:9#200#mugatos}, or at least beat them back some?

At least this place isn't crawling with mugatos. Literally.

But they'll be back, I'm sure.

What pests!
